php.LBL_STATS_DESC:
Help us improve YetiForce and our services by sending us anonymous information about your current CRM version. 
 Data that we collect includes: 
- your instance’s unique key generated only for the purpose of newsletter 
- system version 
- language 
- time zone 
 We treat security matters extremely seriously and we ensure that collected data is only used for statistical purposes. 
 Join us and build YetiForce\’s community with us.
php.LBL_DATA_SAVE_FAIL: An error occurred while saving, please check your logs
php.LBL_MISSING_LIBRARY: Detected missing library. Some features were disabled. In order to enable them please download the library. If the CRM has no Internet connection, you can download the files and copy them to %s folder.
php.LBL_MISSING_HTTPS: Your connection to the server is not encrypted. If the connection is not established through the HTTPS protocol the communication may be intercepted or altered by third parties. The recommended configuration can be found in the "Web server requirements" article in the documentation.
php.LBL_DISK_FULL: There is not enough free space on your disk (%s of %s), so the system may stop working. Directory path: %s
php.LBL_VULNERABILITIES_IN_DEPENDENCIES_DESC:
Vulnerabilities in libraries were detected, it is recommended to update them quickly. 
 Vulnerabilities:
php.LBL_CONFIGURE_ENCRYPTION_DESCRIPTION: No encryption causes that sensitive data such as passwords to mailboxes and access keys are stored in a public form in the database.
php.LBL_CONFIG_SERVER_DESC: Server configuration was not set properly. There may be problems with the system, or the data entered may be damaged or deleted. More information can be found in the article %s. Detected problems:
php.LBL_SECURITY_CONF_DESC: Detected errors in the configuration of parameters related to system security. There may be problems with the system, or the entered data may be damaged or deleted. More information can be found in the article %s. Adjust the following parameters:
php.LBL_CRON_DISABLED_DESC: The schedule mechanism of cron tasks has not been activated thus not all system functionalities are available
php.LBL_CRON_TASK_FAILED_DESC: Not all cron tasks were completed successfully.
php.LBL_NEWSLETTER_NO_COMPANY_DATA: No e-mail address was added to company details. Fill in the required data if you want to receive a newsletter.
php.LBL_UPDATER_DESC: به روز رسانی برای سامانه در دسترس است. ما توصیه می کنیم نسخه خود را به روز رسانی نمایید.
